mapper.select: SELECT subNo, email, s.memberNo, nickName, TO_CHAR(subStart,'YYYY-MM-DD') subStart, nickName, TO_CHAR(subEnd,'YYYY-MM-DD') subEnd FROM subscript s JOIN member m ON m.memberNo = s.memberNo WHERE SYSDATE >= subStart AND SYSDATE <= subEnd
SELECT LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME='SUBMAIL_SEQ'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUBMAILINFO(mailNo, subject, content, sendDate, senderEmail) VALUES(#{mailNo}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{senderEmail})
mapper.select:
SELECT mailNo, subject, content, TO_CHAR(sendDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') sendDate, senderEmail, nickName senderName FROM SUBMAILINFO si JOIN member m ON m.email = si.senderEmail
ORDER BY mailNo DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM SUBMAILINFO si JOIN member m ON m.email = si.senderEmail

SELECT mailNo, subject, content, TO_CHAR(sendDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') sendDate, senderEmail, nickName senderName, (select COUNT(*) cnt FROM submail where mailNo = #{mailNo}) cnt FROM SUBMAILINFO si JOIN member m ON m.email = si.senderEmail WHERE mailNo = #{mailNo}

SELECT mailNo, subject, content, senderEmail, TO_CHAR(sendDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') sendDate, nickname senderName, (select COUNT(*) cnt FROM submail where mailNo = #{mailNo}) cnt FROM subMailInfo si JOIN member m ON m.email = si.senderEmail WHERE mailNo < #{mailNo} ORDER BY mailNo DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT mailNo, subject, content, senderEmail, TO_CHAR(sendDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') sendDate, nickname senderName, (select COUNT(*) cnt FROM submail where mailNo = #{mailNo}) cnt FROM subMailInfo si JOIN member m ON m.email = si.senderEmail WHERE mailNo > #{mailNo} ORDER BY mailNo ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
